attributes.action: Grant NATO membership to Ukraine now
attributes.additional_details: Find further ways to fund Ukraine (liquidate russian assets; hold a national collection day). Rally NATO members, hold a NATO vote, commit forces to defend a cease fire. Campaign for stopping Putin
attributes.background: Petition NATO to respond to president Zelenski’s request for NATO membership.

rejection.details: You may also wish to sign this petition which calls for a support package to be sent to Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/706447
